oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Friday Night Show - 1947-11-28 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: 1947-11-28 broadcast of WSM's Friday Night Show (part 1). Featuring Eddie Birnbryer (MC), Ray Robbins, Milly Coury, Dr Milton Estes and the Silo Symphony, Lazy Jim Day, The Dixie Dons, Jane Dabney, Elmer Alley, Frank Melfi, and Beasley Smith and his orchestra The Friday Night Showmen. Introduced by David Cobb.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddie Birnbryer; Frank Melfi; Dixie Dons; Ray Robbins; Milly Coury
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Studio ambience -- Comedy routine (Eddie Birnbryer, Frank Melfi) -- Theme -- Opening statement (David Cobb) -- Comedy routine (Eddie Birnbryer, Frank Melfi) -- Idaho (The Dixie Dons) -- Comedy routine (Eddie Birnbryer, Frank Melfi) -- Eddie Birnbryer introduces Ray Robbins -- Night And Day (Ray Robbins) -- Eddie Birnbryer introduces Milly Coury -- Embraceable You (Milly Coury) [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Friday night show (Radio program); Cobb, David (Announcer); Birnbryer, Eddie; Melfi, Frank; Foster, Ray Elden, 1912-2010; Coury, Milly, 1927-2011; Estes, Milton, 1914-1963; Day, Jim; Dixie Dons (Musical group); Dabney, Jane; Alley, Elmer; Smith, Beasley; Friday Night Showmen (Musical group)
